about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a web developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. With a strong background in frontend and backend development, I specialize in building modern and responsive web applications using the latest technologies and best practices.
about.skillsDescription: Currently specialized in frontend technologies such as React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Three.js, and GSAP Motion, along with CSS frameworks like Tailwind and Bootstrap. I also have backend experience with Node.js, PHP, and MySQL, and development tools like Vite, Webpack, Git, and GitHub.
about.objectives: My goal is to continue growing as a developer, staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies, while contributing to challenging projects that allow me to expand my skills and create innovative solutions.

skills.description: A set of technologies and tools that I master to create exceptional web experiences.

experience.title: Academic and Professional Background
experience.description: My education and experience in web development
